name: UnHarmonic Shield Conduits
desc: Specialized gravitic conduits which increase passive Flux Dissipation. The amount is dependent on the ships current proportion of hard flux compared to its maximum on a curve that approaches %s/%s/%s/%s-percent depending on hull size. This gain falls off sharply after approximately 60%% hard flux.
short: Improves flux dissipation as hard flux rises.

name: Reduced Hangar
desc: While this vessel can launch fighters, one must wonder if it really should; the incredibly cramped conditions of this ships flight deck make deck operations take %s percent longer than they should.
